Table of Contents

Name

conqai -- Conquest AI override program

Synopsis

conqai [-r]

Description

This manual page documents briefly the conqai command.

This manual page was written for the Debian distribution because the original program does not have a manual page. Instead, it has documentation in plain text format; see below.

conqai is a program that allows suitably privileged individuals to take over robot control from the Conquest driver, for debugging purposes.

The root user is always a Conquest Operator (CO) and therefore can run the conqoper program. If you want to allow other people to be CO's, you will need to add them to the conquest group.

Options

-r
Return control of the robots to the Conquest driver. Be sure to do this after you are finished running conqai to debug the AI, otherwise the robots won't do anything but sit there.

See Also

conquest (6) , conqoper (6) , conqstrat (6) .

The programs are documented in text files present in /usr/share/doc/conquest/ .
